characters.story: The person stands for likeness, shouting "Shyahng!" sharply!
Picture horse taking form - it whispers "Mah" with vivid energy!
Picture mama taking form - it sings "Mah!" with vivid energy!
"Mah!" The net trapped the horse sharply - time to scold, curse, blame and insult!
Like a mouth, this character means yes or no and asks "mah"!
"Yahn!" The erudite horse commanded sharply to check - test, examine, inspect for verification!
"Chee, are we astride?" The horse tool questioned riding curiously - equestrian!
The strokes unite to show startled, singing "Jing!" cheerfully!
Picture tiger taking form - it whispers "Hoo" with vivid energy!
"Lyoo!" The tiger heart commanded sharply to ponder - worry with prudence!
The strokes unite to show location, shouting "Choo!" sharply!
"Shee!" Tiger play commanded sharply to frolic - a theatrical show!
The sword takes the shape of drama, shouting "Jyoo!" sharply!
See how the hand forms certificate? It shouts "Jyoo!" sharply!
The strokes unite to show deer, shouting "Loo!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
The earth takes the shape of dust, asking "Chun? Ashes?" curiously!
A striking symbol for lovely that shouts "Lee!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
Like fire, this character means bear and asks "Shyohng? Powerful?"!
The moon and meat unite to create ability, asking "Nung? Capable?" curiously!
